div.p: The most difficult thing for me is a personal thing really because I have got a learning difficulty which is dyslexia and I do find it
very difficult to actually do day-to-day admin stuff. However, with the way technology is now and actually dealing with computers I find it’s getting
a little bit easier for me because you’ve got items on there that allows you to do spell check and check things but it does take me 3 or 4 times
longer to prepare maybe a letter than it would any of my other colleagues who, you know, really are very good at that sort of thing.
I think the least thing I like about my job to be honest with you is not having enough time for myself sometimes, it’s running your own
business you find that you can be working long hours and sometimes, you know, you can suddenly say this weekend you’re going to be off...
